name: linuxmag.vim
summary: linuxmag.vim is a syntax highlighting file for Linux Magazine articles
description:
If you ever find yourself writing an article for Linux Magazine,
try this syntax highlighting file out.  It understands the mark-up
conventions used by the editors there.  A short overview of the
mark-up format is included in the archive.
install_details:
Copy linuxmag.vim to ~/.vim/syntax and whenever you're editing
an article for Linux Magazine, do the following in vim:

    :setf linuxmag
